unexpected.body: Our bad, something went wrong. We could show you some scary error message but you should just let us know :)

Please ask the room owner to invite you to the room again.

signup.title: Sign Up

tos.label: I agree to the <1>Terms of Service</1>

signup.imgAltText: A key floating magically in the air. A With logo is emblazoned on the attached key tag.
signup.invitationDestination: We sent a confirmation link to <1>{{email}}</1>
signup.invitationHelp: If you didn't receive the email, you can <1>request a new link</1>. Don't forget to check your spam folder!
signup.invitationImgAltText: A postmarked letter flying through the air

newsletterOptIn.label: Please send me how-to guides and updates

signup.alreadyRegistered: You've got a With account already — please sign in!
signup.joinFlow: You'll need an account to join someone's room. After you've created one, try clicking that link again.
signup.earlyAccessAccept: By signing up to With Early Access, you agree to receive occasional emails asking for your feedback. As one of our first users, your input will help us make With even better.

confirmationView.title: Check your email
confirmationView.bodyText:
We sent a magic link to {{email}}

Click on the link in the email and you will be automatically logged in.

If you didn’t receive the email, you can <3>request a new link. Don't forget to check your spam folder!
confirmationView.snackSuccessMsg: We just sent you new magic link.

dashboard.feedbackItemBodyText: You will soon have the ability to create new rooms, rename rooms, and delete rooms.

RESOLVED_OTP.title: This link has already been used.
RESOLVED_OTP.body: For your security, some links can only be used once.

messages.provideValidYoutubeUrl: Please provide a valid YouTube URL
messages.malformedUrl: Please check to make sure URL has been properly copied from the email.
messages.mobileNotOptimized: With is currently not optimized for mobile. We'd rather polish the experience before you can use it. Sorry for the inconvenience.
messages.chromeOnIosRestrictions: Due to technical restrictions on iOS, With cannot work in Chrome on iOS - please use Safari. Sorry for the inconvenience
messages.noRoomPassword: You need a password to join this room
messages.incorrectRoomPassword: The password you entered is incorrect
messages.noRoomAccess: You don't have access to this room. You'll need the password to get in.
messages.joinRoomInvalidScreenName: Please provide a valid screen name.
messages.joinRoomUnknownFailure: Failed to join room - check your network connection.
messages.fileTooLarge: Too large: files up to {{maxMegabytes}}MB only
messages.catastrophicMediaError: Something went very wrong while activating your media device. Try refreshing the page to see if that helps.
messages.socketReconnectingDetails: Connection interrupted - check your internet status.
messages.mediaReconnectingDetails: Audio and video are temporarily unavailable
messages.socketUnavailable: We couldn't connect to our servers. Check your internet status and contact us if this persists.
messages.mediaUnavailable: We lost our media connection (sorry!). Audio and video are unavailable. Check your internet status and contact us if this persists.
messages.maxRoomNameCharacters: Room name cannot be more then {{maxChar}} characters.
messages.checkboxRequired: Please check this box to proceed

widgetsFallback.title: Accessories error
widgetsFallback.msg: An error occurred while setting up the room's accessories. Try refreshing the page and rejoining the room to fix this error.

unexpectedModal.title: Well, this is awkward...
unexpectedModal.msg: An unexpected error has occurred. Please try refreshing the page and rejoining the room.

TOO_MANY_OWNED_ROOMS.message: You have reached your limit of number of rooms you can create.

UNEXPECTED.message: Something unexpected has happened. Please try again later.

media.title: {{device}} access has been denied.
media.supportText: Instructions for enabling your {{device}} access can be found in the <1>With help portal.</1>
media.audioPermissionDismissed: If you want to share your voice, we'll need microphone access. Press the button to enable your mic, then choose "Allow"
media.audioPermissionDenied: You've told your browser not to allow microphone access for With. Change that setting to start sharing your voice.
media.videoPermissionDismissed: If you want to share your video, we'll need camera access. Press the button to enable your camera, then choose "Allow"
media.videoPermissionDenied: You've told your browser not to allow camera access for With. Change that setting to start sharing your video.
media.screenSharePermissionDismissed: If you want to share your screen, we'll need access. Press the button to share your screen, then choose "Allow"
media.screenSharePermissionDenied: You've told your browser not to allow screen share access for With. Change that setting to start sharing your screen.
media.unexpectedMediaRequestFail:
Something unexpected happened when requesting your device permissions.

Please double check your <1>browser settings and try again.

If this issue persists, please contact us directly at <3>support@with.so.

roomMangement.createRoomErrorTitle: Oops! There was an error while creating the room.
roomMangement.renameRoomErrorTitle: Oops! There was an error while renaming the room.
roomMangement.deleteRoomErrorTitle: Oops! There was an error while deleting the room.
roomMangement.message: Please retry. If that keeps happening, please <1>contact us</1> and we will sort it out.

omnibar.quickActionEmptyMobile: Type or paste links and notes, or select an action below.

paste.modalDetails: Are you sure you want to add this to the room?

roomControls.copyLinkButtonAria: Copy the secret link to the clipboard
roomControls.roomOwnerOnlyExplanation: Only the room owner can toggle the secret link.

away.explainerText: While away, your camera is off, your mic is muted, and the room is silent.
away.explainerImgAlt: An illustration with a grayed-out avatar bubble

inviteUserModal.title: Invite people
inviteUserModal.getStarted: Get started by inviting some people!
inviteUserModal.removeConfirmDesc: Are you sure you want to remove {{user}} from the room? The content this user has added in the room will remain in the room.
inviteUserModal.roomOwnerOnlyMsg: Only the room owner can remove members.

wallpaperModal.title: Room wallpaper
wallpaperModal.customWallpaperTitle: Link to an image ({{fileTypes}} are supported)

step1.title: Welcome
step1.text:
Thanks for being an Alpha user.

There are still many things we need to build, and many things we need to learn.

Let us show you around!

step2.title: A spatial place
step2.text:
In With, audio is based on proximity. You can drag your avatar and get closer to others to hear them clearly.

You can pan and zoom in the room using your mouse, keyboard, or trackpad.

step3.title: Be present on your terms
step3.text:
You can turn on your camera to engage heads-up, or choose a fun character to take the pressure off.

Set a status to let others know what you’re up to, or hide in a corner to focus!

step4.title: Accessorize
step4.text:
Type or paste anything into the Omnibar and it will suggest the best accessories to add to the room.

Sticky notes, web links, whiteboards, and YouTube videos are currently available.

displayNameInput.label: Display Name
displayNameInput.helperText: Name that is displayed in the room

bugReportModal.title: Report a bug
bugReportModal.confirmationText:
Report sent successfully

Thanks for helping us build a better product!
bugReportModal.errorMessage: Something unexpected has happened. Please contact us directly at support@with.so.

devicePermissionsModal.title: Audio & video access
devicePermissionsModal.permissionExplanationText:
For others to see and hear you, your browser needs access to your microphone and to your camera.

You can turn them off at any time.
devicePermissionsModal.setupExplanation: Take a moment to set up your camera and microphone if you like.
devicePermissionsModal.permissionDeniedExplanation: Oops! Seems like With doesn’t have access to your camera and microphone.

createRoomModal.title: Create new room
createRoomModal.explainationText: Give it a nice room name, so it’s easy for your guests to find it!
createRoomModal.limitTitle: Oops! You can’t create rooms anymore
createRoomModal.limitBody: We currently have a limit of {{maxRooms}} rooms per user. If you need more rooms, please <1>contact us</1>!

deleteRoomModal.title: Delete {{roomName}}
deleteRoomModal.explainationText:
Are you sure you want to delete {{roomName}} and all the files and accessories that it contains?

This action cannot be undone.

Please type in the name of the room to confirm deletion.
